Which of the following would not be a goal of sustainable development?
choices: a demographic transition to a stable world population of low birth and death rates
an increasing reliance upon renewable energy
a resource transition to reliance on nature’s “income” without depleting its “capital”
a transition to more efficient use of energy and resources

What does LD50 mean?
choices: the dosage needed to kill half of a population
half of the dosage needed to kill an entire population
the lethal dosage for a population

questions.question: If the lethal dose of parathion, an insecticide, is 1.5 mg/kg, how much would kill a 10 kg dog?

Which of the following was not associated with the Green Revolution?
choices: use of machinery to carry out high-intensity farming
use of a greater variety of crops

What is the relationship between soil formation and soil depletion at the present time?
choices: soil is being formed slightly faster than it is being depleted
soil is being formed at the same rate than it is being depleted
soil is being formed slightly slower than it is being depleted
soil is being formed much slower than it is being depleted

choices: leaving a field bare all winter

questions.question: Which term includes the others
When did synthetic pesticides become widely used?
choices: at the beginning of the 20th century
at the onset of the agricultural revolution
at the onset of the industrial revolution

questions.question: Which statement is true?
choices: almost all of a pesticide reaches its intended target
about 75% of a pesticide reaches its intended target
about 50% of a pesticide reaches its intended target
about 25 % of a pesticide reaches its intended target
about 10% of a pesticide reaches its intended target

questions.question: Which of the following processes are responsible for the pesticide treadmill?
choices: pests develop a resistance to pesticides
larger doses are eventually needed for the same result
new pesticides must continuously be developed
pesticides kill the predators or competitors of the pests

questions.question: Which of the following is not true about DDT?
choices: it is concentrated in the food chain
its residue can be found throughout the world

questions.question: Who is more likely to use more pesticides than needed?
Which of the following is not a part of integrated pest management (IPM)
choices: using biological controls such as ladybugs
using cultivation techniques that minimize the spread of pests

questions.question: Which of the following is the most damaging?
choices: decrease in abundance of a once-plentiful species

questions.question: Which of the following has caused the greatest amount of species extinction
How does the current rate of extinction compare to past rates of extinction
choices: it is slightly greater than the normal rates of the past
it is much greater than any time in the past
it is greater than all but the most catastrophic extinction events of the past
it is not significantly different from normal rates of the past

questions.question: What caused the ivory trade to collapse?
choices: the decline of the Elephant population due to competition of alien species

What is the relationship between the size of an island and the biodiversity on the island?
choices: no relationship, a large and a small island are likely to have about the same number of species
slight relationship, a large island is likely to have slightly more biodiversity
great, a large island will have considerably more biodiversity than a small island
